gololang

Class IO

  • java.lang.Object
    • gololang.IO

  • public final class IO
extends java.lang.Object
    Module providing IO related utility functions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IO.LinesIterator
      An iterator on the lines of a java.io.BufferedReader.

      • textToFile

        public static void textToFile(java.lang.Object text,
                              java.lang.Object file)
                       throws java.lang.Throwable
        Writes some text to a file. The file and parents directories are created if they does not exist. The file is overwritten if it already exists. If the file is "-", the content is written to standard output.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to write.
        file - the file to write to as an instance of either String, File or Path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • textToFile

        public static void textToFile(java.lang.Object text,
                              java.lang.Object file,
                              java.lang.Object charset)
                       throws java.lang.Throwable
        Writes some text to a file using the given Charset. The file and parents directories are created if they does not exist. The file is overwritten if it already exists. If the file is "-", the content is written to standard output.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to write.
        file - the file to write to as an instance of either String, File or Path.
        charset - the charset to encode the text in.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • fileExists

        public static boolean fileExists(java.lang.Object file)
        Check if a file exists.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read from as an instance of either String, File or Path.
        Returns:
        true if the file exists, false if it doesn't

      • printStreamFrom

        public static java.io.PrintStream printStreamFrom(java.lang.Object output)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Create an PrintStream from the specified value.

        Same as printStreamFrom(output, defaultCharset())

        Parameters:
        output - the file to use; "-" means standard output
        Returns:
        a buffered PrintStream or java.lang.System.out
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        defaultCharset(), printStreamFrom(Object, Object)

      • printStreamFrom

        public static java.io.PrintStream printStreamFrom(java.lang.Object output,
                                                  java.lang.Object charset)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Create an PrintStream from the specified value.

        If the given string is "-", java.lang.System.out is used. Otherwise, a java.nio.file.Path is created with toPath(Object). The returned PrintStream is buffered and uses the given charset. Parent directory is created. If the file exists, it is overwritten.

        Parameters:
        output - the file to use; "-" means standard output
        charset - the charset to use, as a java.lang.String or a java.nio.charset.Charset
        Returns:
        a buffered PrintStream or java.lang.System.out
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        toPath(Object), toCharset(Object)
